long_description: Tech Wash removes residue left by detergents so that waterproofing agents such as Nikwax(R) TX Direct will work more effectively. Protects the water repellency of rainwear made with Gore-Tex(R), REI Elements(R) or other waterproof/breathable coatings or laminates. Designed to work with Nikwax TX Direct which restores the water-repellent finish on your rainwear.
short_description: Tech Wash removes residue left by detergents so that waterproofing agents such as Nikwax(R) TX Direct will work more effectively.
